cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.7)
project(istio_all)

#set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

# envoy/source/common/common/version_linkstamp.cc:5:35:
add_definitions(-DBUILD_SCM_STATUS="1")
add_definitions(-DBUILD_SCM_REVISION="2")

# tracer
add_definitions(-DPACKAGE_VERSION="2")

# main.cc
add_definitions(-D_GLIBCXX_REGEX_STATE_LIMIT)

# protobuf requires it
add_definitions(-DHAVE_PTHREAD)

# Merged includes for all deps. Generated files are checked in (similar with golang style)
include_directories(
        envoy/source
        envoy/include
        src/protobuf/src
        src/spdlog/include
        src/libevent/include
        src/cares
        src/boringssl/include
        src/http-parser
        src/nghttp2/lib/includes
        src/rapidjson/include
        # Tracing
        src/lightstep-tracer/src/c++11
        # CLI
        src/tclap/include
        # Backtraces
        src/backward
        gen/include
)

set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY OPENSSL_ROOT_DIR src/boringssl)

# This doesn't work - requires installed openssl. We want to use our own version, and have an hermetic build.
#add_subdirectory(src/libevent)

set(LIBEV_SOURCE
        src/libevent/buffer.c
        src/libevent/bufferevent.c
        src/libevent/bufferevent_filter.c
        src/libevent/bufferevent_pair.c
        src/libevent/bufferevent_ratelim.c
        src/libevent/bufferevent_sock.c
        src/libevent/event.c
        src/libevent/evmap.c
        src/libevent/evthread.c
        src/libevent/evutil.c
        src/libevent/evutil_rand.c
        src/libevent/evutil_time.c
        src/libevent/listener.c
        src/libevent/log.c
        src/libevent/signal.c
        src/libevent/strlcpy.c
        )
